Title: Eastern Spring and Western Canon: I
Text:
Side by side: brother, buddy, friend.
Shake/report a crank: to report a name.
Stifle the bars, not to shine the steel: inconvenient to inform the name.
Big/Loud crank: a person with a big name.
Empty: a white person who doesn't know the jargon.
Tuanchun: communicating in jargon.
Legs: a person who is admired.
Ladybird: boss, chief.
Tuan Shui Huo: hand over the SHC money.
Zhaoluzhuanghe: put your eyes on, look carefully.
Zhaizi: eyes.
Shunfengzi: ears.
Golden rod: legs.
Qingzi: swords and weapons.
Stick: guns.
....
